title: Toe-tapping smart shoes send Morse code messages
text:
Toe-tapping smart shoes send Morse code messages Tuesday, March 06, 2018 - 01:45 
Boots with sensors in embedded in the toe-cap allow the wearer to tap out a Morse code-style message. They're designed to improve worker safety in remote, dangerous or noisy workplaces. Matthew Stock reports.   
Boots with sensors in embedded in the toe-cap allow the wearer to tap out a Morse code-style message. They're designed to improve worker safety in remote, dangerous or noisy workplaces. Matthew Stock reports.  //reut.rs/2oRYnGX
